A → Y: Reduces enzyme activity and affinity for substrate. Alters the stereospecificity, so that androstenedione is converted to testosterone. 1 Publication Manually curated information for which there is published experimental evidence. K → A: No effect on affinity for androstenedione. Slight increase of catalytic activity. 1 Publication Manually curated information for which there is published experimental evidence. Q → N: Decreases affinity for NADP. Changes enzyme activity, leading to the production of testosterone and concomitantly reducing the production of epi-testosterone. 1 Publication Manually curated information for which there is published experimental evidence.
